function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems and high mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health interventions, such as lockdowns and community management","Technologies":"Digital technologies including BDA, AI, and 5G","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequacy of medical staff and resources in severe areas","Impact":"Inability to diagnose and treat infectors effectively","Mitigation":"Use of 5G-based telemedicine for remote diagnosis and treatment","Technologies":"5G-based telemedicine","People":"Infectors, healthcare workers in severe areas","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of 5G application scenarios","Impact":"Potential misuse or unintended consequences of 5G technology","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on social and business values of 5G","Technologies":"Research and development in the field of 5G","People":"Research community, technology industry","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"}]}
